comments:
build 20020521

When debugging I copied a simple expression:
"(rbBand.fStyle & OS.RBBS_BREAK)"   Where  rbBand is a local variable and 
OS.RBBS_BREAK is a final static int.
Into the Display view, and then clicked on the Inspect button and I got a 
dialog message reporting:
An exception occurred: class java.lang.ClassCastException - 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIPrimitiveValue
If I click on the Display button I got the same error, but without the dialog 
only the message on the display view itself.

Here the stack:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 120 May 24, 2002 15:07:25.138
!MESSAGE Internal error logged from JDI Debug: 
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIPrimitiveValue
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.instructions.PushFieldVariable.execute
(PushFieldVariable.java:40)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.Interpreter.execute
(Interpreter.java:34)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.EvaluationThread$2.run
(EvaluationThread.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIThread.runEvaluation
(JDIThread.java:542)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.EvaluationThread.doEvaluation
(EvaluationThread.java:148)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.EvaluationThread.access$2
(EvaluationThread.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.EvaluationThread$1.run
(EvaluationThread.java:95)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:512)

Need more information. Exactly where were you performing the evaluation? We 
need to know what type of variables rbBand.fStyle and OS.RBBS_BREAK are. What 
types and how/where are they declared.

What is the evaluation context? Where were you suspended when you performed 
the evaluation?

In the CoolItem.setMininumSize
Sorry, I can't be more precise.

If I see this bug around again I give you more information.

We were broken for all evaluations of the form:
<variable>.<field> <op> <primitive>

Fixed in ASTInstructionCompiler.visit(QualifiedName)
